headline.main: NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES; FIFTY-FIRST ANNUAL APPEAL NEW YORK CITY'S HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES NEW YORK CITY'S HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES FIFTY-FIRST ANNUAL APPEAL NEW YORK CITY'S HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES FIFTY-FIRST ANNUAL APPEAL

docs.lead_paragraph: As another Christmas approaches, The New York Times today opens its fifty-first annual appeal for New York City's Hundred Neediest Cases. Here on these pages are one hundred stories of courage and despair, of human hope and human hopelessness.
docs.snippet: As another Christmas approaches, The New York Times today opens its fifty-first annual appeal for New  York City's Hundred Neediest Cases. Here on these pages are one hundred stories of courage and despair, of human hope and human hopelessness.
